snippet: More universities are including offbeat essay topics on students’ admissions applications to separate the highly creative from the highly ordinary.
abstract: More universities are including offbeat essay topics on students’ admissions applications to separate the highly creative applicants from the highly ordinary; most elite colleges use Common Application, which contains fairly standard essay questions, and require their own supplemental applications, with more writing exercises to find distinction among applicants.
lead_paragraph: More universities are including offbeat essay topics on students’ admissions applications to separate the highly creative from the highly ordinary.

headline.main: Robots or Aliens as Parents? Colleges Gauge Applicants’ Creativity
headline.print_headline: Robots or Aliens as Parents? Colleges Gauge Applicants’ Creativity
